short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find Facebook posts you've liked or commented on by keyword search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trying to find that Facebook post from a week ago, but can't remember who posted it or in which group? Post Facto indexes all posts that you react to or comment on *in your browser* and makes them searchable via a simple keyboard-shortcut accessible (opt-p) overlay on facebook.com.
